body:
So, as you may no, or not know, i have a brother by the IGN of {tag=5c0994b2c2cc479aa2a94d8c3fb6e23b} . We live in the same household, therefor the same IP adresse. Now, we both play nebula ALOT and both get occasional temp bans. When of of us is temp banned, the staff usually thinks we are ban evading. either on my account his account, or my alt account, {tag=33d6c2811bfd4740941a069db5ce05b8}. I have spoken with {tag=b8ee253714ff484dae1d8146fcfa8fe1} and {tag=8de835a6916a4fcf9b25239dda454411} about this, and have worked it out.

Im just clarifying, 

so thanks
body_tagged:
So, as you may no, or not know, i have a brother by the IGN of  pinksheps . We live in the same household, therefor the same IP adresse. Now, we both play nebula ALOT and both get occasional temp bans. When of of us is temp banned, the staff usually thinks we are ban evading. either on my account his account, or my alt account, gameboygirl. I have spoken with XtraMajestical and Passively about this, and have worked it out.

Im just clarifying, 

so thanks
title: Just Clarifying
